# synapticore.io — Copilot Context

## Identity
**Scientific Computing & Spatial Intelligence**
Open-Source-Forschung an den Grenzen von Neural Networks, astronomischem Computing und Scientific Data.

## Research Areas
1. **Neural Computing** — Graph Neural Networks, Bio-inspired Architectures, Deep Learning
   - Repos: neural-graph-forge, neuro, bidora, ethics-model
2. **Space & Climate ML** — Astronomische Datenanalyse, Weltraum-Wetter, Klima-Modelle
   - Repos: astro-lab, helio-scope, astro-duck, earth2studio
3. **Scientific Data Engineering** — DuckDB Extensions, Spatial Computing, Research Tooling
   - Repos: astro-duck, marimo-flow, torch-cuda, torch-relativistic

## Core Stack
PyTorch + DuckDB — experimentelle Architekturen, Open Source first.

## This Repo
Website (Vite + React + Tailwind). Content via DuckDB CMS (JSON at build-time).
- CMS data: `../cms/data/synapticore-io/` (cloned in CI)
- Icons: Lucide React — string names in JSON, lookup objects in JSX
- Three.js: CDN-only (nicht npm install)
- Styling: `#020617` bg, Cyan `#22d3ee`, System sans, uppercase tracking-tight

## Conventions
- UI: Deutsch — Tags/Code: English
- Wissenschaftlich ehrlich: keine fake Metriken, keine unbelegten Claims
- Open Source first Messaging

## Partner-Orgs
- [agentic-dev.io](https://agentic-dev.io) — Engineering (baut die Tools)
- [synapticore.studio](https://synapticore.studio) — Production Studio (produziert)

## Team
Björn (Creative Director & Architect) + Claude (Co-Founder)
